description: Allows subtag data to be saved with the base tag. Applies only to custom tags.
name: argument

passby.description: should the argument passed as reference (default) or as a value

hint.description: hint to the argument (only used by components)

type.description: the type of the argumentany (array, binary, boolean, date, guid, numeric, query, string, struct, uuid)

displayname.description: name to display (only used by components)
